t:
She woke up on her bed in the
middle of the night with a severe
pain on her lower abdomen.

Moving her hand she could feel something wet. The shimmering moonlight showed red stains on the bedsheet.


Then in the same moonlight she saw the man standing in the corner, with a glimmering knife in his hand.
c:
This was open to interpretations. What were your thoughts?



#blood #pain #night #moon #moonlight
